text:
I’m looking to modify the `theme.spacing.vertical_spacing` variable in the boilerplate theme’s `theme-variables.css`:

```{% set dnd_section_padding = theme.spacing.vertical_spacing ~ 'px ' ~ '1rem' %}```
I assume this is being pulled from a configuration option under *Design > Global Content & Styling* (see screenshot) because I don’t see it defined in the code.

So my question is - are the values in *Global Content & Styling* applied to all of my themes within HubSpot, or just the one the page I’m editing is using? (I’m developing a new theme and don’t want to break any existing landing pages)
Just the one the page you're editing is using.
It'll effect all pages using that theme
